title: Ultimate Shenron, Dimensional Wishmaster
energy_text: X()
skills_text:
This card can't attack.
Draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand and place it at the bottom of your deck, then choose up to 1 red 《Earthling》-only Battle Card with an energy cost of 2 in your hand and play it.
, if your Leader Card is a red 《Earthling》-only card and all of your energy is mono-red : Choose up to 1 red Unison Card with a specified cost of 4 in your hand and play it with 2 markers on it.

title: Trunks, Power to Save the Future
skills_text: If your Leader Card is a blue 〈Trunks : Future〉 card : When this card is played, you may choose 2 blue Battle Cards in your hand and place them in your life face up. If you do, add 2 cards from your life to your hand.

title: Ginyu Force, the Showstoppers
energy_text: 2()
skills_text:
This card gains ＜Recoome＞, ＜Jeice＞, ＜Burter＞, and ＜Guldo＞ in all areas.
If your Leader Card is a green 《Ginyu Force》 card and you have 2 or more energy : When this card's attack deals damage to an opponent or removes a marker from an opponent's Unison Card, play up to 1 green 《Ginyu Force》 card with an energy cost of 2 from your deck other than copies of this card, then shuffle your deck.

title: Son Goten & Trunks, Super Saiyan Tag Team
skills_text: If your Leader Card is a yellow 〈Gotenks : Adolescence〉 card : When this card is discarded by a skill, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards, ignoring , and switch it to Rest Mode. You can't activate the skill on copies of this card for the turn.

title: Towa, Rewriting History
skills_text:
When this card is played, add up to 1 《Dark Dragon Ball》 card from your deck or Drop Area to your hand, then shuffle your deck if you looked through it.
, if your Leader Card is black, you have 3 or more energy, and you choose 1 non-black 《Dark Dragon Ball》 card in your hand and place it in your Drop Area : Play up to 1 〈Dark Broly〉 card or non-black Battle Card with 〈Xeno〉 in its character name and an energy cost of 4 or less from your deck or hand, then shuffle your deck if you looked through it.
